page.title: 03WHITELEAS SHOPS,SO.SHIELDS
page.content: The shops are situated in Whiteleas Way on the Whiteleas Estate and are a very important feature of life for many local residents,(mainly old-age pensioners),not only because of the service it provides but because it acts as a social meeting place too. There are 15 shops altogether covering the following services: {Post Office,newsagent,confectioner, {baker,butcher,chemist,greengrocer, {hairdresser,draper,off-licence,fish {and chip shop and mini-supermarket. } The shopping area tends to be most busy mid-morning,particularly the baker,butcher and greengrocer. Security does not seem to be a problem amongst the shopkeepers. Vandalism,however,is.At night, groups of bored teenagers gather and cover the shop fronts with graffiti.
